Issues

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Tests.Perf_DateTime.GetNow has regressed across multiple configurations #67932
  • Assertion at..., condition '<disabled>' Blazor Web assembly #67911
  • System.Tests.Perf_Enum.EnumToString has regressed across multiple configurations #67909
  • Crash of our NetCore 6 Application #67897
  • [Perf] Changes at 4/8/2022 8:59:46 PM #67916
  • Regressions due to Roslyn update #67914
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_Leipzig #67913
  • [tvOS] Failing System.Numerics.Vectors.Tests #67893
  • Getting the event Notification on Sql Server Disconnection in ADO.Net #67908
  • Ability to define the System.Text.Json attributes on implemented interfaces #67892
  • Parsing format string precision intends to validate for overflow but the check does not work #67891
  • jit.1 work item failing on mono #67888
  • EMSDK-.WasmNativeDefaultsTests work item failing #67887
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.RegexMatchTests.Match_InstanceMethods_DefaultTimeout_Throws failing on CoreCLR checked runs #67886
  • HashAlgorithmTest.ComputeHashAsync_SupportsCancellation() fails to throw OperationCanceledException #67880

Closed

  • Improve allocations in `ConfigurationBinder` #67566
    7.0.0
  • HttpClient crashes android app when trimmed #67402
    6.0.x
  • Multi-targeting logic in Source Generators in NuGet packages doesn't work transitively #60870
    7.0.0
  • AddNETStandardCompatErrorFileForPackaging should allow for libraries to add their own buildTransitive logic #63413
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/PGO/ProfileCastClassAndIsInst/ProfileCastClassAndIsInst_random2/ProfileCastClassAndIsInst_random2.sh #67631
    7.0.0
  • [Mono] Intrinsify API's of System.Numerics.Vector and new API's of System.Runtime.Intrinsics.{64, 128} on Arm64 #64072
    7.0.0
  • Missing CI validation for RHEL 7.2 Release #8843
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_Mariomkas #67915
  • System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests_MsQuicProvider.WriteAsync_LocalAbort_Throws failed with OperationCanceledException #67612
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer does not work with Dictionary<string, object> #67588
    7.0.0
  • Test failure DataContractSerializerTests.DCS_MyPersonSurrogate_Stress #67410
    7.0.0
  • !sos.eeheap shows all LoaderCodeHeap sizes as 0 #58067
    7.0.0
  • Test failure: System.IO.Tests.StreamReaderWithBufferedStream_Tests.ReadToEndAsync_WithCancellation #67730
  • [HTTP/3] Test failure ResponseCancellation_ServerReceivesCancellation #56194
    Future
  • Help: .Net 6 and emitting IL to call constructors and methods that have pointers as arguments #67844
  • The dynamic type created is thrown FileLoadException when using the GetCustomAttributes method #67802
  • [ARM64] Consider using LDAPR to implement volatile reads when instruction is available. #67374
    7.0.0
  • FreeBSD's Interop.Process.cs has an off-by-1000 error #67807
    7.0.0
  • Rolling build failure: LibraryImportGenerator.UnitTests.Diagnostics.StringMarshallingForwardingNotSupported_ReportsDiagnostic #67864
  • First chance exceptions and missing logging when a service isn't given a service name #62923
    7.0.0
  • TimeZoneInfo doesn`t support Europeans identifiers (EET CET WET) #67296
  • Add support of standard streams redirection in dbgshim #10077
    Future
  • Add some of Intel ISPC methods to System.Numerics.Vector? #35460
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Make Decimal constructor decimal.ToDecimal(ReadOnlySpan<byte> span) public #66171

PullRequests

Created

  • improve Tls12 detection on Windows7 #67935
    area-System.Net.Security, test-enhancement
  • Add single-file debugging fix to DBI #67934
    NO-MERGE, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [wasm] Bump chrome used for testing to `100.0.4896.88` #67933
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Minor fixes #67931
    area-Meta
  • Handle more scenarios for loop cloning #67930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add MemoryExtensions.CommonPrefixLength #67929
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #67928
    area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #67927
    area-Infrastructure
  • Mono - Add error on warnings #67926
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Update VSCode library debugging documentation #67925
    documentation, community-contribution
  • Add CompilerFeatureRequiredAttribute #67924
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Expose ConditionalWeakTable.TryAdd #67923
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix Assembly reference in unloadability #67922
    area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • System.Diagnostics.Activity: Implement Enumerate* API #67920
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Activity, community-contribution
  • Add support for storing method handle histograms in profiles #67919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() #67917
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Add RegexFindOptimization for embedded strings #67907
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Disable System.Net.Security.Tests ClientAsyncAuthenticate_MismatchProtocols_Fails #67906
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Disable System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.CertificateValidationRemoteServer_EndToEnd_Ok ok Windows 7 #67904
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Make BSWAP16 nodes normalize upper 16 bits #67903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert Vector.Equals optimization #67202 #67902
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Handle parameterless ctors in structs in STJ's ReflectionEmitMemberAccessor #67901
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Make ReRegisterForFinalize GC test more robust #67896
    area-GC-coreclr
  • AddUserSecrets fails in environments without generic env var and OS special folders #67895
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • WIP: Use csel for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Skip SIP in walk_relocation #67889
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Implement Tar APIs #67883
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • avoid using TcpClient in FtpWebRequest #67881
    area-System.Net

Merged

  • Fix incorrect format string arguments #67464
    area-Host, codeql
  • Annotating Regex library for Native Aot apps #67841
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Rewrite line to avoid subtlety #67921
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix uninitialized vtable bug #67746
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Only add placeholder pkg file if folder is empty #67647
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • ARM64 - Emitting `msub` instruction #66621
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1712914 #67874
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix exception thrown when MsQuicStream write direction is locally aborted or canceled #67753
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add timeout parameter to perf-job to allow passing to template #67764
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix Assembly.LoadFrom resolver #67890
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fix error message for invalid assembly name #67882
  • Fix unsupported type detection when serializing polymorphic System.Type instances #67618
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • JIT: fix interaction of OSR and shadowed parameters #67884
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix sos.eeheap's LoaderCodeHeap sizes #67885
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix exception and enable event logging when service has no name #67827
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • Adding missing SDK assets for Publish #67765
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Add ReplenishingRateLimiter and IdleDuration #67020
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix & => && typo in Uri #67900
    area-System.Net, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Reenable ResponseCancellation_ServerReceivesCancellation #67535
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [Mono] Fix warnings to enable W4 on Windows. #66710
    os-windows, area-Build-mono
  • Fix hanging of NamedPipeClientStream when connecting with infinite timeout #66877
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Run large file test on its own #67857
    area-System.IO
  • Faster IndexOf for arm64 #67811
    area-System.Memory
  • Stop passing StandardOptimizationData.mibc to crossgen2 multiple times for SPC #67458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disabe regex timeout test #67898
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [arm64] Add RCPC ISA (8.3+) and use ldap for volatile reads #67384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Mark GCStressIncompatible and similar tests as out-of-proc #67876
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix off-by-1000 error reported in issue#67807 #67834
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Code fix to add DisableRuntimeMarshalling when required #67676
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Fix inadvertent logical AND #67875
    area-System.Speech
  • S.S.C.Cose: Add Stream-based signatures #67786
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Support ByRefLike types as Generic parameters #67783
    NO-MERGE, area-TypeSystem-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Move EventPipe thread buffer allocation outside of lock #67936
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug on firefox #61776
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • perf: Don't build in the payload directory on helix #67792
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • ARM64 - Optimizing a % b operations part 2 #66407
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Single-file debugging support in DBI and createdump #67163
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [PERF][MAUI] Add iOS Startup Scenario (Runtime side) #67670
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: Add Microseconds and Nanoseconds to TimeStamp, DateTime, DateTimeOffset, and TimeOnly #67666
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Add/use CustomTypeMarshaller implementations for string marshalling #67635
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator
  • Enable installation on Ubuntu 22.04 - add libssl3 dependency #67862
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup, 5.0.x
  • [iOS] Remove unnecessary newline from CI script #67861
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Add SubstitutionParser that uses XPath Navigator into NativeAOT #64671
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add initial impl of PartitionedRateLimiter.Create #67677
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add xarch `blsmsk` #66561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fix in-process decoding of DateTime in EventSource #67557

  • [release/6.0] [wasm] Bundle net472 dependencies for MonoAOTCompiler task #67757
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 6.0.5
  • [release/6.0] [Mono] Fix uninitialized vtable bug #67759
    area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.5
  • Fixed error messages on collections indexing #67696
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • JIT: Refactor call argument representation #67238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147

  • [draft] JSImportGenerator #66304

  • Fix pal_assert.h when PAL_STDCPP_COMPAT defined #64631

  • [arm64] Accelerate HexConverter::EncodeToUtf16 #67192

  • JIT: Optimize range checks for X >> CNS and for short/byte indices #67141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • HttpHeaders should not remove invalid values during validating access #67833

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

Created

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Roslyn looks to emit incorrect IL for `nuint -> double` #60714
  • Need telemetry reported for cache-effectiveness for NavTo/FindRefs indices #60710
  • `CSharpSyntaxGenerator.AsInterfaceMember` fails for nested types in interfaces #60708
  • Revise `FindImplementationForInterfaceMember` for abstract statics #60704
  • Add public APIs for FixAll functionality for CodeRefactorings #60703
    Backlog
  • Source generators and different versions of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common #60702
  • Refactor local function from lambda #60701
  • Parsing Error with XML-Style Comments Inside Triple-Slash Documentation #60700
  • Refactor entry point finder code #60696

Closed

  • CS2002 warning can't be treated as an error #60709
    Backlog
  • Crash when params array used with reordered attribute arguments #60572
    17.2
  • `[ReadOnly]Span<T>` fields and properties in a `ref struct` can have a `stackalloc` as a default value #60568
    17.2
  • [PDB][EE] Return Offset in Async Method should not be hidden #60602
  • Tuple type cast in pattern matching becomes a no-op #60699

PullRequests

Created

  • Relax requirements around second parameter of a user-defined shift operator. #60717
    Area-Compilers
  • NRT enable C# EditorFeatures project. #60716
    Area-IDE
  • Support checked operators in explicit interface implementation #60715
    Area-IDE
  • Fix 'move to namespace' with file scoped namespaces. #60713
    Area-IDE
  • Improve command-line parsing for linux #60711
    Area-Compilers
  • Address PROTOTYPE comments #60707
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Fix flaky VSTypeScriptHandlerTests #60706
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix FAR on checked operators #60698
    Area-IDE
  • Allow code actions to retrieve options for any language #60697
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Use VS2022 for official build #60712
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Check val escape for initializers of fields with ref-like type #60577
    Area-Compilers, Approved to merge
  • Fix crash when combining reordered arguments with params array #60590
    Area-Compilers, Approved to merge, 17.2
  • Add TS external access API for ICommentSelectionService #60687
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #60695
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • IDE changes for "Unsigned Right Shift" feature, plus tests. #60689
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - UnsignedRightShift
  • Add parameters in scope in nameof in certain attributes #60642
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable null on UseExplicitTypeCodeFixProvider #58866
    Area-IDE
  • Fix typo in `#if` directive #60555
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Initial sketch of exposing imports from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-ready-for-review
  • Share the indices we create for files that do not have PP directives in them #60693
    Area-IDE
  • Implement IAttributeOperation #59369
    Area-Compilers, Community, Feature - IOperation
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • handle null compilations in entry point finder #60562
    Area-IDE
  • Support SetsRequiredMembersAttribute #60392
    Area-Compilers
  • Safely create VirtualCharSequence from string in StackFrameParser #59283
    Area-IDE
  • Allow generating variable with contextual keyword name in return statements #60684
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Code style to convert byte arrays to UTF8 strings #60647
    Area-IDE
  • Add FixAll support for code refactorings #59809
    Area-IDE
  • Generate static abstract interface members correctly #60618
    Area-IDE
  • Simplifier options #60174
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid formatting diagnostics with raw strings #60655
    Area-Compilers
  • Show generator produced diagnostics #60474
    Area-IDE
  • Grab bag of UTF8 string support in IDE features #60599
    Area-IDE
  • Stop switching /langver to preview for generator tests #60691
    Area-IDE
  • Fill out test plan for auto-default structs #60688
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [signalr-client-c++] Client does not send access_token for calls after negotiate. #41159
  • Length client side validation of HTML Select isn't working properly #41152
  • .NET SignalR client getting stuck sending messages #41150
  • Request Body as a string. #41145
  • Order KestrelTrace by event ID #41143
  • MetadataTypeAttribute (still) does NOT work for Blazor WASM (.NET 6) #41142

Closed

  • Multiple Authentication Schemes Validation chain behavior #41130
  • The front end text boxes width is minimized after running them this is happening for next 2 weeks #41147
  • [release/6.0.2xx] source-build: Remove *.Razor.*.Tooling.Internal prebuilts #40395
  • Error "View Index.cshtml not found" and also .html caused by missing Packages which were not needed before .net 6.0.2 #40454
  • Blazor Server RuntimeCompilation like in Razor pages #41126

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix component government bugs #41160
    3.1.x
  • Update SDK #41158
    blocked, area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #41156
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #41154
    3.1.x
  • Allow specifying authz policies on endpoints #41153
    area-security
  • Update `.vsconfig` to match Visual Studio install script config #41144
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update SiteExtensions versions #41157
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview4
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #41155
    5.0.x
  • Revert "Update SDK" #41151
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview4
  • Update SDK #41136
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview4
  • Quarantine GET_RequestReturnsLargeData_GracefulShutdownDuringRequest_RequestGracefullyCompletes #41075
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4

Updated

  • Introduce IBindableFromHttpContext<TSelf> #41100
    area-web-frameworks
  • HTTP/2 output processing make over #40925
    area-runtime
  • Updated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers to latest stable #41115
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • JSON "null" response body rejected as an empty response body #41002
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • [SignalR] Add client return results #40811
    area-signalr
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Enable trimming for data protection #41118
    area-security, community-contribution

Issues

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui should default PublishReadyToRun true on Windows Release #6025
  • Project using MultiPage migrated from Xamarin faults on MAUI - Resubmission #6024
  • RC1 Compilation failed to complete #6022
  • 'UIApplication.Windows' is unsupported on: 'ios' 15.0 and later #6020
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Visual State Manager Ignored in CollectionView #6019
  • SwipeView custom items are not rendering #6018
  • Maui Blazor App (new template) will not build for iOS after update to latest VS Version 17.2.0 Preview 3.0 #6017
  • SwipeView Threshold changes width and offset of the side menu (when visible) #6016
  • FilePicker doesn't take into account IsExternalStorageManager #6015
  • Documentation - add advanced sample for every control and also screenshots for this sample #6011
  • Blazor Hybrid: Cannot resolve type for @page from Razor Class Library #6010
  • StackLayout.IsEnabled = FALSE does not Disable the Child Components within it #6008
  • Some control styling doesn't reflect UserAppTheme #6006
  • Remaining Todo items in Android WebKitWebViewClient #6002
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Include an option to add a menu item separator. Sometimes menu items need to be logically grouped. #5999
  • Publish MAUI app with project reference to class library net6.0 - cause erorrs #5993
  • Editor AutoSize on Text Change Surpass the border around it #5991
  • After navigating back, button command is not responding to click #5987
  • Externally hosted images cannot load on hybrid Android apps #5986

Closed

  • [Help] Cannot build project on RC1 #6021
  • Access modifier of ShareImplementation and PreferencesImplementation is set to Internal, Check for others too #6007
  • OnAppearing firing twice when using Shell.Current.GoToAsync() #5877
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • BottomTabs on Android shell is currently recreating the Page Handler with each navigation #5615
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Android] Shell back button toggle not working #5643
    6.0.300
  • BlazorWebView API review: WPF #5910
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • BlazorWebView API review: WinForms #5909
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • BlazorWebView API review: Windows #5906
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • LinearGradientBrush crashes app on launch on iOS #5812
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Recreating the Handler for a Page causes the GestureManager to remain disconnected #5594
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Blazor Desktop API review #2539
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Editor Size does not change on iOS #5990
  • BlazorWebView API review: Android #5907
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • Exception when using Editor with WidthRequest inside horizontal StackLayout #5749
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • BlazorWebView API review: iOS/macCatalyst #5908
    6.0.300-rc.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Create Flyout.Details inside Fragment #6023
  • Update ASP.NET Core Packages to 6.0.4 And Remove Coherent Dependency #6014
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix nullable annotations for `Preferences` #6013
  • Add public api analyzer to Maui.Core #6003
  • [iOS] Add vertical text alignment to Editor #5996
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Android] Show keyboard when Entry, Editor and SearchBar get focus #5995
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Correctly render Shape Background (and BackgroundColor) #5994
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Add User-Agent when downloading image streams #5985
    t/bug, area/image :framed_picture:

Merged

  • Don't destroy fragments when switching tabs #6005
  • Keep the text wrapping/truncation and max lines stuff in Controls #5936
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fix typo in XML doc #6001
  • WinForms/WPF/MAUI-Windows API review changes #5998
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [android] Update to latest AndroidX packages with better Trimmable support. #5889
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add pending changes in Alerts (RTL, Keyboard) #5739
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • [iOS] Fix crashing converting GradientPaint to GradientBrush #5997
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, fatal
  • Blazor Hybrid Android API Changes #5988
  • Use SizeToFit when measuring Editor on iOS with infinite constraints #5981
    area/layout 🔲

Updated

  • Fix violations of Platform Compatibility Analyzer CA1416 #5650
    area/tooling ⚙️
  • Remove downcasts in BlazorWebView #5984
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [workload] Merge Dependencies and Extensions packs #5918
    area/setup 🪄
  • Maui Windows unpackaged app fails to start #5979
    area/desktop 🖥️, area/publishing 🏁
  • Fix AppTitleBarHeight to match caption button heights #5811
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Move Handler?.UpdateValue after PropertyChanged events #5980
    area/controls 🎮
  • Add svg to default copied bundle items for mac/ios #4863
    6.0.300
  • BlazorWebView API review changes: Shared sources #5982
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [iOS] Implement iOSPlatform Specifics #5879
    platform/iOS 🍎
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄, Future
  • [Android] Implement Android Platform Specifics #5831
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • [Windows] Implement Windows Platform Specifics #5855
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️
  • Fix cleanup and wiring up when changing out the content on window #5917
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Rowversion type generates timestamp data type. #27806
  • Issue with EF 6 migration from ef 3.1 instead of delete perform update. #27805
  • EF Core with spatial column throws exception: Could not load file or assembly Microsoft.SqlServer.Types #27804
  • Efcore sometimes fails to save related data. #27803

Closed

  • BenchmarkDotNet - EF6 performs better than EF Core for ToList() #27694

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #27813
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Update to .NET SDK 7.0.100-preview.3 #27812
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #27811
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #27810
  • [release/6.0] Tools: Target .NET 6 to improve compatibility with osx-arm64 #27807
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0 #27809
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #27808

Updated

  • Attribute for configuring DeleteBehavior #27630
    waiting-for-response
